question: What is the rank of India's Gujarat International Finance Tec-City (GIFT) IFSC in global financial centres index?
explanation: India's first International Financial Services Centre (IFSC), Gujarat International Finance Tec-City (GIFT) IFSC has ranked at 10th place in the latest September 2017 edition of Global Financial Centres Index 22 (GFCI) - London. Currently it is operational with approximately 10 leading banks, eight insurance companies and participating brokers, and two international exchanges.
